title: Why the Supreme Court Might End Affirmative Action
description: A blockbuster case about race-conscious admissions programs in higher education could reshape American life.
dc:creator: Sabrina Tavernise, Stella Tan, Sydney Harper, Diana Nguyen, John Ketchum, Mike Benoist, Dan Powell, Chelsea Daniel and Chris Wood
media:credit: Al Drago for The New York Times
media:description: Protesters outside the Supreme Court this week. Weakening affirmative action would decrease the representation of Black and Latino students and bolster the number of white and Asian ones.
